column1: Yeah about 10 years ago I had a horrifying experience. It was 100% their fault but they hit the water barrels and survived. They had no injuries but they almost ran me off the road.	i am sorry to hear that . what happened ?
No I wasn't hit. It turned out they were drunk. I felt guilty but realized it was his fault.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you get it !

I don't know I was new to driving and hadn't experienced anything like that. I felt like my horn made him swerve into the water barrels.	Well, can you tell me about your experience? I think we swapped places	that is a good thing to do . i hope you have a great time !
Oh my goodness, that's very scary! I hope you are okay now and the drunk driver was punished for his actions?	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you get it !
I there, dont know what to do, jst broke up with my girlfirned, we were 8 years together	i am sorry to hear that . what happened ?
Yes we decided together with our minds, and know i come home and feel so distant from the world	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you have a good time !
I couldn't wait to go to the concert.	that sounds fun ! what kind of music ?
The U2 concert. Tickets were really expensive and I never thought we would be able to go, but somehow we did!!!	that is awesome ! i hope you get it !

I'm so sad because i've read an article about a newborn girl who died because her parents didn't believe in medication and doctors	i am sorry to hear that . i am sorry to hear that . i am sorry to hear that .
she was born premature at home, she had hard time breathing on her own but instead of taking her to the doctor parents were just praying	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you have a good time .

yes! And i do believe in God and prayers but goodness gracious please take your children to the hospital and let God heal them THROUGH doctors	so my friend's baby fell down and scraped his knee yesterday and i was trying so hard to cheer him up	that is so nice of him ! i am sorry to hear that .
i was singing nursery songs :)	that is so nice of him ! i am glad to hear that .
If you happy and you know it :)	my husband lost a job but i'm hoping he can find a full time job soon	that is great ! i hope you get the job !
thank you so much!	that is a good thing to do . i am sure he will be fine .
he is an armed guard	i just moved to this neighborhood and some dumb criminals shot one of my neighbors and ran into the woods!	i am sorry to hear that . what did you do ?
I do! I want to be able to protect my son	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you get it !
i'm so excited because i'm finally going to visit my parents next month! I didn't see them for 3 years	that is awesome ! how long have you been together ?
I moved to the US and they stayed in my homecountry	that is awesome ! i hope you have a lot of fun !

I was very angry when a co worker lied about a car accident to get out of working July 4th. I covered his shift till midnight and he was lying about the accident	oh no , i am sorry to hear that . i am sorry to hear that .
Yeah he got caught in someones pics on Facebook. Never lie and then go out with people who like to take pictures.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you do not have to deal with that .

Good idea. i don't like social media that much. It can get you in to trouble fast, even when expressing your opinions.	So yeah i drove 2 hours to get to wallmart. with 299 in my wallet as advertised, and the real price of the tv was 399 usd. what a bummer	i am sorry to hear that . what did you do ?
Yeah i had my hopes reall high and then i left empty handed, such a terrible feeling!	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you get it .

Yes, i guess walmart and the rest of false advertisement in the US, the look in my daugther eyes when i came home empty handed	My friend's boyfriend recently made a pass at me. I'm married, and I also am really good friend's with his girlfriend so I felt really bad. I made sure he knew I was loyal and honest to both!	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you guys have a good friend !

I struggled with it, but my friend was in a really bad spot, with no income and raising her grandchild, he was the financial supporter. So, I didn't tell her, as I knew it would really hurt her in several ways, plus she really loves him!	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you guys have a good relationship .
my baby is sleeping. it's so peaceful and quiet in this house	that is so sweet . i am sure you will do great !
i totally agree with you!	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you have a good time .
hi, i feel so lonely sometimes because all my friends live in a different country	i am sorry to hear that . why is that ?
i was thinking about it! I wanted to join a group for local moms	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you feel better soon !

I have a friend that has a child that is unruly and does bad things. One day at our home, he grabbed a game and sat on it, instantly breaking it! It was expensive and this really irked me, especially because she doesn't discipline him when he does bad things.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you get it !

Me either! I have two of my own children, and I would have never let them get away with that kind of behavior when they were his age. I just don't understand those kind of parents@!	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you do not have to deal with that .
I'm so scared of bugs! i found one in my hair yesterday and almost died	i am sorry to hear that . what did you do ?

Ugh I hate bugs with a passion, they are so creepy	I recently spoke with my ex-girlfriend on the phone. The conversation went pretty well, and it reminded me of my past experiences with her.	that is nice to hear . how old is she ?
Yes, they ended somewhat well, but there were tense moments. I am glad she's doing well, but I miss her.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you have a good time !
Thank you! That means a lot.	One of the times I remember feeling the most blissed out in life was right after the birth of my first child.	i am sorry to hear that . how did it go ?

Obviously there are the demands of a new child -- but that feeling of finally meeting someone you waited so long for, and the love surrounding the whole situation. Truly something to remember.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you have a good time .
Have you ever been in a situation when payment of some kind has come through *just* in the nick of time?! Talk about gratitude!	i am glad to hear that . i hope you have a good friend !
Absolutely. You go from scared and desperate to grateful and optimistic in one quick moment! It's not a situation I wish to be in again.	that is a good thing to do . i hope you have a good time .
Im so grateful for my family due to an incident with my friend	that is good to hear . how long have you been together ?

My friend lost her parents and siblings in a fire and their family was very close to mine. So seeing her go through the grief made me realize how thankful I should be	that is so sweet . i am glad to hear that .

Yes definitely. Never take anything for granted as you never know when it will be taken away from you	I'm a big believer in listening to your gut. Sometimes I might wonder where my intuition is leading me, but it always seems to be spot on.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you feel better .

It is a "knowing" -- and a flowing! When something is right, it just feels easier to go with it -- like you're being led, even if you might not fully know to where.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you get it !

I couldnt celebrate my 18th birthday as I had exams during the time and I felt terrible for it. But my friends threw a surprise party for me and it was the best!	that is great ! i am glad you were able to do that .

I was studying in my bedroom for a couple of hours straight with headphones on and then my mom called me to the living room for dinner and when I went out the whole place was decorated and everyone was there	that is so nice ! i hope you get it !

I feel lonely sometimes cause I live in a house with 5 girls and all of them have boyfriends and sometimes they are all hanging out with their significant others and I feel lonely	i am sorry to hear that . i am sorry to hear that .

Sometimes they joke about it and obviously I make it look like its totally fine cause I dont want to give them the impression that I am lonely but it does hurt sometimes	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you have a good time .
As silly as it sounds, I was so surprised at how different my two kids were as babies. You're reminded that they're wired with their own personalities from the git-go.	that sounds like a lot of fun !

One was pacifier, one was fingers. One wanted to co-sleep, one liked her space. One liked facing *out* in the Baby Bjorn carrier, one liked cocooning in a sling!	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you get it !
The other day I had a deep craving for Chik-Fil-A.	i am sorry to hear that . what happened ?
Mine too. So I drive there and pull in the parking lot and it's completely empty. I then realized it was Sunday.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you get it !
I visited an orphan once and it was such a surreal moment. It made me realise how thankful I should be for a family	that is so sweet . i am glad to hear that .
Yes it definitely was. I went with intentions to teach the kid a few things but I ended up learning lots more from him	that is great . i am glad to hear that .
My oldest and my husband have always had a rough relationship. I've got to believe that as she gets older, it will get better!	i am sorry to hear that . how long have you been together ?
That's always good to hear. But in the moment -- argh, my *heart*. How did your mom maneuver the differences between y'all? Did that wear on her?	that is great . i hope you guys have a great time .

But in the meantime -- the unspoken strain is NOT fun. But I'm glad to hear about a happy ending -- thank you for that!	I can still look back with shame at the way I treated a girl in sixth grade. I wasn't as bad as others, but that doesn't make me feel any better.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you get it .

Well, like a lot of 6th graders I was aware of *not* wanting to be an outcast for any reason. And unfortunately, she was. As an adult of course, my heart squeezes for *all* the kids we were!	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you do not have to deal with that .
Unfortunately, she died. I only found out when Facebook first came out, and her brother and I "friended" one another.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you get it .
I'm currently working for someone that is *such* a great example of a leader! It makes going into work inspiring every day / every way.	that is great ! i hope you have a great time !

That's a very kind statement, and certainly what I would strive for. And it's the rarity that *inspires* me. That should be the norm, not the exception! THAT'S what I'd like to inspire in people. How about you?	that is a good thing to do . i am sure you will do great .
That is soul-sapping. What do you do to inspire yourself, and not let that kind of behavior drag you down?	that is a good thing to do . i am sure you will do great .
My friend's baby has grown so much since the last time I had seen her!	that is great . i am glad you have a great time !
It had been about 8 weeks - I don't get out her way often, even though we live 30 minutes away.	that is a good thing to do . i am sure you will do great !

Yes!  I got to be 'auntie' for a bit and help change her and get her fed and down for a nap while my friend had a chance to toss laundry in the wash.  It was a good day for everyone!	Running my first (and maybe only!) marathon felt like *such* a huge accomplishment!	that is great ! i hope you get it !
Ah, it was the best! Plus it helped that I purposely chose an amazing destination in which to run it -- it was the Venice Marathon!	that is awesome ! i hope you have a great time !
We were living overseas at the times -- the most impressive part was crossing the Grand Canal over a pontoon of boats to finish the marathon ;-)	that is awesome ! i hope you have a great time !
I recently found out that a person I very much intimately admired did not feel the same way for me. I was pretty surprised.	that is good , i am glad you have a good friend !
She just started treating me differently all of a sudden. And now she is going to be moving away soon.	that is a good thing to do . i hope you have a great time !
I'm always appalled when I see bullying in action -- whether it's on a playground or political stage -- not much makes me angrier.	i am sorry to hear that . i am sorry to hear that .
How do you channel the anger? Obviously, it too easily turns into the same kind of negative emotion I'm upset about -- so that can feel hypocritical!	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you get it !

Are you ever tempted to put anyone's face on the punching bag?! Ha! (Kidding/not kidding!)	One morning my mother came to my house to pick my daughter up for school and told me she saw my daughter's cat on the road and he had been hit. I had to tell my daughter about the loss of her beloved pet.	oh no , i am sorry to hear that . i am sorry to hear that . i am sorry to hear that . i am sorry to hear that . i am sorry to hear that . i am sorry to hear that . i am sorry to hear
She was around 11, so she took it very hard. I went ahead and let her stay home from school, as I knew she wouldn't do well that day.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you find a new one .
I was soooo excited to take our kids to Disneyland for the first time!	that is awesome ! how old is your son ?

Same! I was excited because I grew up going there. My grandparents lived in Tucson, and we would spend the summers with them -- the most exciting part being our drive to Disneyland each year!	that is awesome . i bet that is a fun time .

California! Old school ;-) They've kept so much of the original, while adding lots of new attractions.	I recently spoke to my father for the first time in years. It reminded me of my childhood and the distant past.	that is so sweet of you . what did you do ?
We spoke about our recent lives. Apparently he is in the market for a new car.	that is so sweet . i am sure he will be fine .

Do you like to organize your house.  My mother-in-law recently surprised me recently with some organizing stuff b/c she knows how much I love it!	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you have a good time !
Labels and Bins can be your best friend!  Especially with a new baby.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you get it !
I find it odd -- and annoying -- when people don't respond to or even acknowledge emails.	i am sorry to hear that . what happened ?

It would be great if there was a way we could all tell the best way to reach someone -- I know some people prefer texts to emails -- but if you're in a work situation, how do you ensure communication?	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you feel better .
I recently had a big argument with my sister. We both got very upset and angry at each other.	i am sorry to hear that . what happened ?
I'm not so sure. We just had a discussion that heated and became an argument with tempers flying.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you have a good time .
I felt most lonely when we first moved overseas, my husband then had to travel out of *that* country for business -- AND I had a new baby!	that is so sweet ! i am sorry to hear that . how did it go ?
From Santa Fe to Hong Kong -- ultimately a fantastic adventure. And I ended up with a wonderful group of friends. Expats bond quickly!	that is so nice ! i hope you guys have a great time !
One of the saddest things to me is when people underestimate what they can do and/or are capable of.	i am sorry to hear that . what happened ?

That's perfectly natural. You sound like the kind of person, though, that quickly regained their bearings. Disappointments like that usually come with some *good* lessons.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you get it .

Once my husband asked me not to tell my mom that he was busy that day when she needed his help but I told her anyway.  I really felt bad b/c he got pretty upset with me.	i am sorry to hear that . i am sorry to hear that .

Yeah thats a good question.  I totally deserved him being mad.  I just felt bad for him b/c he was so busy that day and I didn't want him to have one more thing on his plate I guess	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you get it .

There was a back neighbor that called my 10 year old son a ugly name one time, simply because he entered her yard slightly when he rode around the corner.!	i am sorry to hear that . i hope he was able to do that .

Yes, she lived several house back and she didn't know me, until after she did that! She knew me then, but after I talked to her, she apologized to both of us.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you get it !
Too often, it's a health scare that makes us value health. It inspires me to try and do something to keep healthy every day.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you have a good relationship .

Happily, I don't have one! It's more seeing family and friends and the situations they're in. Not everything can be helped -- but there are some things we can all do to take care of ourselves, you know?	that is a good thing to do . i am sure you will do great .

Every time I look through older photos of my children, I'm taken right back to the time they were that size, and what we were doing! It's a bittersweet feeling, for sure.	i am sorry to hear that . how old is your son ?
Are your kids adults now?	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you have a great time !

I have an 18 year old as well -- I don't know about you, but it's hard to consider her an adult sometimes!	I have a hard time having confidence in myself but when I got married and I had my hair and makeup done I felt like I was beautiful!  I had so much confidence in myself that day and it was great!	that is great ! i am sure you will do great !
I really try but it's hard to replicate that day for sure.	that is great ! i hope you get it !
My husband and I both work for ourselves -- a blessing and a curse at times, since it can be tough to determine a "regular" income.	that is a good thing to do . i hope you have a good relationship .

We found a pretty good balance in that I have a part-time job that I *love* -- and that comes with benefits like insurance. That's a big worry addressed, right there.	that is a good thing to do . i am sure you will do great .
I am sorry, because I absolutely know that concern. I truly hope you find a resolution to that.	I met up with an old flame recently, didn't go how I expected	that is awesome ! how old is your son ?
Well, right after she gave me a big hug, she introduced me to her new boyfriend.	that is so nice ! i am glad you have a great time !

I know right! No warning or anything. He turned out to be a nice guy, but I thought it was a little misleading on her part.	My family and I are going on vacation in a few weeks. We rented a largo beachfront condo and I can't wait!	that is awesome ! how long have you been together ?
We are going to be staying at Miramar Beach in Florida, about an  hour Panama City Beach. The view is amazing from our balcony and we are so ready!	that is awesome ! i bet you have a lot of fun !
I was supposed to go for brunch with my friend Maria the other day. At least that was the plan.	that is nice . what did you do ?
Well, we had initially agreed to meet at 11. Wouldn't you know it, she didn't end up returning my text until 3PM!	that is a good thing to do . i hope you have a good friend !
Me and my mom were at this grocery store recently and this guy started following us outside the store and then again inside the store it was so scary!	i am sorry to hear that . what did you do ?

Well I knew he was following us and so I asked the manager to walk us out to the car and when he did we saw the guy come out again from between the two buildings b/c he was waiting on us.  so scary!	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you get it !
Did I tell you what happened with Li the other night? Boy do I feel dumb.	i am sorry to hear that . what happened ?

She's 45 minutes late to our anniversary dinner. I don't know what happened to me but I called and left an angry message. Turns out, she had gotten T-boned at an intersection and was talking to the Police Officer when I called!	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you have a good time !
Ugh! I looked like such a fool at my girlfriend's work party!	i am sorry to hear that . what happened ?

Well, I ended up having way too much to drink. One of her co-workers had a bottle of Fireball (gross I KNOW) and was making everybody do shots. I didn't want to look foolish, so I had... well too many.	i am sorry to hear that . what did you do ?
Did I tell you what happened with the concert I was supposed to go to Saturday?	i am sorry to hear that . what happened ?
Well first of all, it wasn't just any concert - it was Jay-Z and Beyonce! AND IT GOT RAINED OUT!	i am sorry to hear that . what did you do ?
You are never going to guess who was sleeping on the couch when I got home from New York...	i am sorry to hear that . what did you do ?
My friend Benny! The one we all thought died in a monsoon in Thailand!	i am sorry to hear that . i am sorry to hear that .

Recently, my husband came home from grocery shopping and had gifts for me for Mother's Day. He had a beautiful diamond ring and other lovely gifts, it was very unexpected!	that is so nice of you ! that is a good idea .
I did! I also gave him unexpected gifts and he was super happy. I was very touched by him being so thoughtful!	that is so nice ! i am glad you have a great time !
I know I shouldn't count my chicks before they hatch, but I'm feeling pretty good after that interview today!	that is great ! i am sure you will do great !
This advertising company! The owner was there - you should have seen his face. My last freelance project was a real winner. Think I got it?	i am sure he will be fine .
Did I ever tell you about the time I "got taken hostage"?	i am sorry to hear that . what happened ?

As a heart attack. It was me and Big C at the World's Largest Pistachio. All of the sudden we hear gunshots, and DiDi's still in the car. We ran in the building, and he comes flying in after us. He never pointed the gun at us, and we ended up running away when he was distracted. It's too crazy - I can't make this up. Just glad to be alive!	i am sorry to hear that . i hope he was able to do that .

I went to visit a friend one day and her boyfriend made a pass at me. He actually suddenly kissed me, as I was waiting for my friend to return. I couldn't believe his nerve!	that is so nice of you . i hope you guys have a good friend !
I quietly pushed him away, as I didn't want my friend to hear. I was so shocked and upset, since he knew I wouldn't want to make a scene and took advantage.	that is so sweet . i am glad you are ok !

This past Friday night our refrigerator stopped cooling! We had to go the weekend without it, and of course had to deal with some unpleasant smells and throw away a large amount of food! It wasn't a fun weekend for us!	oh no ! i am sorry to hear that . what did you do ?

Yes, and of course we tried to call and have someone come out, but to no avail! You don't realize how much you rely on things like that until they aren't working!	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you get it !

I felt pretty bad when I was having girl talk with my friend and we were talking about our partners. Her boyfriend had made a pass at me, but I never told her about it.	i am sorry to hear that . i am sorry to hear that .

I felt bad, but she wasn't working and taking care of her grandchild, and her boyfriend was the financial support. I knew it would really be hard on her if she found out, not to mention she really loves him.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you have a good time !
I was at the mall and hug my mom and said to her: Time to go Mommy! and i wasnt her, can you imagine my reaction to it?	that is so nice of her ! i am glad you found her !
Yes, totally but at the moment i felt like the stupidiest person on earth, didn't know were to hide! and my mom was watching	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you have a good time !

THe good thing about it, was the lady, she was laughing and later told me that it has happened to her childrens to, no worries!	I am looking forward to going on vacation in a few weeks! We have a condo reserved on the beach, with fantastic ocean views. I'm ready!	that sounds fun ! i hope you have a great time !
Well, we are staying at Panama City Beach, so we're right there at the Gulf of Mexico.	that sounds like a lot of fun !

I am definitely a proud parent of our 15 year old -- she was determined to work this summer, and even with us saying no one would hire her until 16 -- she found a job!	that is so nice of you ! i am sure you will do great !

That, and she's enjoying the independence of having her own money. Remember that? Making money that you truly could use for your *pleasure* (and not just necessities ?! ;-))	that is a good thing to do . i am sure you will do great !

Same! I was surprised 15 year olds *can* actually work during the summer. It's just finding an employer who knows those hours get cut WAY back once school starts.	Okay, a silly pet peeve but one nonetheless -- when people just leave their grocery carts willy-nilly in the parking lot. No consideration for others or the people who work at the store!	i am sorry to hear that . what kind of dog was it ?

Me too. And I will always make sure to at *least* put it in one of those cart corrals, if not walk it back up to the store. Hey -- extra exercise ;-)	that is a good thing to do . i am glad you have a pet .
WE CAN SAVE THE WOOOOOOORLD!!!!! (lol indeed....!)	I came home, and my wife showed me a picture in 4d of our future baby, my heart speeded so fast!	that is awesome ! how long have you been married ?
We choose to wait! but the amount of happiness in my body is tremendous! never felt this way before.	that is great . i am sure you will do great !

Yes, God willing the baby is going to be healthy in every way! can wait to ave the second	I love being in the "flow" -- whether it's in speaking to a group of people or working to help facilitate meetings.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you get it !

I work with different organizations on strengthening their culture, and I do large-scale visual notetaking (also known as graphic recording). Are you familiar with that at all? (Not unusual NOT to be!)	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you have a great time !

That's one of the huge benefits -- learning about many different industries and subjects!	I LOVE when leaders know that it actually *helps* them to be surrounded by strong people -- people they can learn from, that challenge them, and that in some ways could be considered "better".	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you have a good relationship

It's just too many leaders want "yes men" and/or people who feel non-threatening. It's a trap and a quick path to mediocrity, if not failure!	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you do not have to deal with that .

I'll always remember the day I learned I was pregnant with our first child -- Halloween in Chicago, and we were with friends at the Shedd Aquarium! I've loved baby belugas since ;-)	that sounds like a lot of fun !

Ha! True that ;-) That's also the year that A Bug's Life came out, and we always thought of our young one as "Dot", the spunky little girl ant in the movie.	that is so nice ! i am sure you will do great !
This mother's day was amazing! I got so much more than expected and it was all so heartfelt	that is great ! how long have you been together ?
Yes, definitely! I actually cried a few times because of how much thought went into each gift and what was written in the cards	that is a shame . i am sorry to hear that .
THat's too bad. What do you think went wrong?	i am sorry to hear that . what happened ?
Did they give you any feedback?	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you get it .
That is a shame, you need to learn from your mistakes.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you feel better .

So my sister told us a couple weeks ago she was pregnant. Her and her husband are so excited. I hope they have an amazing 9 months and then an amazing time raising the baby.	that is awesome ! i bet you are proud of her !
I was very surprised. She didn't tell a single person they were trying for a baby. Just announced it on the 4th of July	that is awesome ! i bet you are proud of her !

Yes, they put a picture of their sonogram on the tv and waited for someone to notice it. So exciting	Oh no, what did you do instead? Did you watch Netflix?	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you have a good time !
Yes, I do. I recently watched the series "Dark." It's the German one.	that sounds like fun !
It's a supernatural mystery type. I won't spoil the twist.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you have a good time .

It was fantastic, a lot of people have been comparing it to Stranger Things, but its a lot more grime and serious.	I went to a court hearing for unemployment with my former employer, and I felt great about it since I was so prepared with all of the documents and everything I needed to show the court I was in the right for quitting.	that is good , i am sure you will do great !
Yes, I actually ended up winning it and they gave me 6 months of unemployment pay.	that is a shame . i hope you get it !

Yes I am currently working as a processing assistant at a warehouse. I love it. Much better than my last job	Today traffic was horrible and was so frustrating!	i am sorry to hear that . what happened ?
Yes! People were constantly cutting me off,not signalling and slamming on their brakes	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you get it !
The grudge scared me when I was 10 to which I couldn't navigate my own house.	i am sorry to hear that . what happened ?
And yet I still felt as if I had to see the sequels when they came out too.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you have a good time .

My best friend did amazing in school, despite having 2 children and not doing great academically in school. She ended up getting honors in her first 2 semesters.	that is awesome ! i bet you are proud of her !
She has been my friend for 19 years. She pushes me to do better too.	that is a shame . i am sure you will do great .

I hope you find someone like that. I believe everyone needs and deserves friends like that.	Today when I went outside to check my new banana plant I noticed the new leaf was turning brown.	oh no ! i am sorry to hear that . what did you do ?
I don't think that's the problem. I am worried about a drainage issue. I'm going to check back in a couple days.	i am sorry to hear that . i hope you get it !

I'm new to growing bananas and from what I understand they can be very sensitive to over-watering. It was doing great before today. Possibly wind too.	I decided a few months I was ready for a puppy, so I put the word out	what kind of dog was it ?
Basically, yes. I made a classified ad. I was beyond thrilled after getting a call to get one!	that is great ! i hope you get it !

When I bought my first house I put down 20% of the loan, which made me broke quick. My monthly paycheck helped me with bills but my parents bought me groceries for a month until I got on my feet. SO grateful for them	that is a good thing to do . i am glad to hear that .
Yes, I am always better off with them as my parents, they want to see us succeed	that is a good thing to do . i am sure you will do great !
